title: Old client
body: is there a way for me to go back to the old client the new client is way to laggy its cost me to dodge three times already, only started experiencing probs with this new beta

replies.body:
For sure, you can go back to the legacy client anytime while the updated client is in testing:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

Thanks for testing!
